00034 void MIDI_Class::begin(const byte inChannel) {
00035         
00036         // Initialise the Serial port
00037         USE_SERIAL_PORT.begin(MIDI_BAUDRATE);
00038         
00039         
00040 #if COMPFLAG_MIDI_OUT
00041         
00042 #if USE_RUNNING_STATUS
00043         mRunningStatus_TX = InvalidType;
00044 #endif // USE_RUNNING_STATUS
00045         
00046 #endif // COMPFLAG_MIDI_OUT
00047         
00048         
00049 #if COMPFLAG_MIDI_IN
00050         
00051         mInputChannel = inChannel;
00052         mRunningStatus_RX = InvalidType;
00053         mPendingMessageIndex = 0;
00054         mPendingMessageExpectedLenght = 0;
00055         
00056         mMessage.valid = false;
00057         mMessage.type = InvalidType;
00058         mMessage.channel = 0;
00059         mMessage.data1 = 0;
00060         mMessage.data2 = 0;
00061         
00062 #endif // COMPFLAG_MIDI_IN
00063         
00064         
00065 #if (COMPFLAG_MIDI_IN && COMPFLAG_MIDI_OUT) // Thru
00066         
00067         mThruFilterMode = Full;
00068         
00069 #endif // Thru
00070         
00071 }

00076 // Private method for generating a status byte from channel and type
00077 const byte MIDI_Class::genstatus(const kMIDIType inType,const byte inChannel) {
00078         return ((byte)inType | ((inChannel-1) & 0x0F));
00079 }
00080 
00087 void MIDI_Class::send(kMIDIType type, byte data1, byte data2, byte channel) {
00088         
00089         // Then test if channel is valid
00090         if (channel >= MIDI_CHANNEL_OFF) {
00091                 
00092 #if USE_RUNNING_STATUS  
00093                 mRunningStatus_TX = InvalidType;
00094 #endif 
00095                 
00096                 return; // Don't send anything
00097         }
00098         
00099         switch (type) {
00100                         // Channel messages
00101                 case NoteOff:
00102                 case NoteOn:
00103                 case ProgramChange:
00104                 case ControlChange:
00105                 case PitchBend:
00106                 case AfterTouchPoly:
00107                 case AfterTouchChannel: 
00108                 {
00109                         
00110                         // Protection: remove MSBs on data
00111                         data1 &= 0x7F;
00112                         data2 &= 0x7F;
00113                         
00114                         byte statusbyte = genstatus(type,channel);
00115                         
00116 #if USE_RUNNING_STATUS
00117                         // Check Running Status
00118                         if (mRunningStatus_TX != statusbyte) {
00119                                 // New message, memorise and send header
00120                                 mRunningStatus_TX = statusbyte;
00121                                 USE_SERIAL_PORT.write(mRunningStatus_TX);
00122                         }
00123 #else
00124                         // Don't care about running status, send the Control byte.
00125                         USE_SERIAL_PORT.write(statusbyte);
00126 #endif
00127                         
00128                         // Then send data
00129                         USE_SERIAL_PORT.write(data1);
00130                         if (type != ProgramChange && type != AfterTouchChannel) {
00131                                 USE_SERIAL_PORT.write(data2);
00132                         }
00133                 }
00134                         break;
00135                         
00136                         // Real Time messages
00137                 case Clock:
00138                 case Start:
00139                 case Stop:      
00140                 case Continue:
00141                 case ActiveSensing:
00142                 case SystemReset:
00143                 case TuneRequest: // Not really real-time, but one byte anyway.
00144                         sendRealTime(type);
00145                         break;
00146                         
00147                 default:
00148                         break;
00149         }
00150         
00151         
00152 }

00155 void MIDI_Class::sendNoteOn(byte NoteNumber,byte Velocity,byte Channel) { send(NoteOn,NoteNumber,Velocity,Channel); }
00157 void MIDI_Class::sendNoteOff(byte NoteNumber,byte Velocity,byte Channel) { send(NoteOff,NoteNumber,Velocity,Channel); }
00159 void MIDI_Class::sendProgramChange(byte ProgramNumber,byte Channel) { send(ProgramChange,ProgramNumber,0,Channel); }
00161 void MIDI_Class::sendControlChange(byte ControlNumber, byte ControlValue,byte Channel) { send(ControlChange,ControlNumber,ControlValue,Channel); }
00163 void MIDI_Class::sendPolyPressure(byte NoteNumber,byte Pressure,byte Channel) { send(AfterTouchPoly,NoteNumber,Pressure,Channel); }
00165 void MIDI_Class::sendAfterTouch(byte Pressure,byte Channel) { send(AfterTouchChannel,Pressure,0,Channel); }
00170 void MIDI_Class::sendPitchBend(unsigned int PitchValue,byte Channel) {
00171 
00172         send(PitchBend,(PitchValue & 0x7F),(PitchValue >> 7) & 0x7F,Channel);
00173         
00174 }
00179 void MIDI_Class::sendPitchBend(double PitchValue,byte Channel) {
00180 
00181         unsigned int pitchval = (PitchValue+1.f)*8192;
00182         if (pitchval > 16383) pitchval = 16383;         // overflow protection
00183         sendPitchBend(pitchval,Channel);
00184         
00185 }

00193 void MIDI_Class::sendSysEx(byte length, byte * array, bool ArrayContainsBoundaries) {
00194         if (!ArrayContainsBoundaries) USE_SERIAL_PORT.write(0xF0);
00195         for (byte i=0;i<length;i++) USE_SERIAL_PORT.write(array[i]);
00196         if (!ArrayContainsBoundaries) USE_SERIAL_PORT.write(0xF7);
00197 }

00200 void MIDI_Class::sendTuneRequest() { sendRealTime(TuneRequest); }

00206 void MIDI_Class::sendTimeCodeQuarterFrame(byte TypeNibble, byte ValuesNibble) {
00207         
00208         byte data = ( ((TypeNibble & 0x07) << 4) | (ValuesNibble & 0x0F) );
00209         sendTimeCodeQuarterFrame(data);
00210         
00211 }

00219         USE_SERIAL_PORT.write(data);

00226 void MIDI_Class::sendSongPosition(unsigned int Beats) {
00227         
00228         USE_SERIAL_PORT.write(SongPosition);
00229         USE_SERIAL_PORT.write(Beats & 0x7F);
00230         USE_SERIAL_PORT.write((Beats >> 7) & 0x7F);
00231         
00232 }

00235 void MIDI_Class::sendSongSelect(byte SongNumber) {
00236

00238         USE_SERIAL_PORT.write(SongNumber & 0x7F);
00239         
00240 }

00245 void MIDI_Class::sendRealTime(kMIDIType Type) {
00246         switch (Type) {
00247                 case TuneRequest: // Not really real-time, but one byte anyway.
00248                 case Clock:
00249                 case Start:
00250                 case Stop:      
00251                 case Continue:
00252                 case ActiveSensing:
00253                 case SystemReset:
00254                         USE_SERIAL_PORT.write((byte)Type);
00255                         break;
00256                 default:
00257                         // Invalid Real Time marker
00258                         break;
00259         }
00260 }

00273 bool MIDI_Class::read() {

00276 
00278 bool MIDI_Class::read(const byte inChannel) {
00279         
00280         if (inChannel >= MIDI_CHANNEL_OFF) return false; // MIDI Input disabled.
00281         
00282         if (parse(inChannel)) return filter(inChannel);
00283         else return false;
00284         
00285 }
00286 
00287 // Private method: MIDI parser
00288 bool MIDI_Class::parse(byte inChannel) { 
00289         
00290         // If the buffer is full -> Don't Panic! Call the Vogons to destroy it.
00291         if (USE_SERIAL_PORT.available() == UART_BUFFER_SIZE) { Serial << "Overflow, call the Vogons!!" << endl;
00292                 USE_SERIAL_PORT.flush();
00293         }       
00294         
00295         if (USE_SERIAL_PORT.available() <= 0) {
00296                 // No data available.
00297                 return false;
00298         }
00299         else {
00300                 
00301                 /* Parsing algorithm:
00302                  Get a byte from the serial buffer.
00303                  • If there is no pending message to be recomposed, start a new one.
00304                         - Find type and channel (if pertinent)
00305                         - Look for other bytes in buffer, call parser recursively, until the message is assembled or the buffer is empty.
00306                  • Else, add the extracted byte to the pending message, and check validity. When the message is done, store it.
00307                  */
00308                 
00309                 
00310                 byte extracted = USE_SERIAL_PORT.read();
00311                 
00312                 if (mPendingMessageIndex == 0) { // Start a new pending message
00313                         mPendingMessage[0] = extracted;
00314                         
00315                         // Check for running status first
00316                         switch (getTypeFromStatusByte(mRunningStatus_RX)) {
00317                                         // Only these types allow Running Status:
00318                                 case NoteOff:
00319                                 case NoteOn:
00320                                 case AfterTouchPoly:
00321                                 case ControlChange:
00322                                 case ProgramChange:
00323                                 case AfterTouchChannel:
00324                                 case PitchBend: 
00325                                         
00326                                         // If the status byte is not received, prepend it to the pending message
00327                                         if (extracted < 0x80) {
00328                                                 mPendingMessage[0] = mRunningStatus_RX;
00329                                                 mPendingMessage[1] = extracted;
00330                                                 mPendingMessageIndex = 1;
00331                                         }
00332                                         // Else: well, we received another status byte, so the running status does not apply here.
00333                                         // It will be updated upon completion of this message.
00334                                         
00335                                         break;
00336                                         
00337                                 default:
00338                                         // No running status
00339                                         break;
00340                         }
00341                         
00342                         
00343                         switch (getTypeFromStatusByte(mPendingMessage[0])) {
00344                                         
00345                                         // 1 byte messages
00346                                 case Start:
00347                                 case Continue:
00348                                 case Stop:
00349                                 case Clock:
00350                                 case ActiveSensing:
00351                                 case SystemReset:
00352                                 case TuneRequest:
00353                                         // Handle the message type directly here.
00354                                         mMessage.type = getTypeFromStatusByte(mPendingMessage[0]);
00355                                         mMessage.channel = 0;
00356                                         mMessage.data1 = 0;
00357                                         mMessage.data2 = 0;
00358                                         mMessage.valid = true;
00359                                         mPendingMessageExpectedLenght = 0;
00360                                         mPendingMessageIndex = 0;
00361                                         mRunningStatus_RX = InvalidType;
00362                                         return true;
00363                                         break;
00364                                         
00365                                         // 2 bytes messages
00366                                 case ProgramChange:
00367                                 case AfterTouchChannel:
00368                                 case TimeCodeQuarterFrame:
00369                                 case SongSelect:
00370                                         mPendingMessageExpectedLenght = 2;
00371                                         break;
00372                                         
00373                                         // 3 bytes messages
00374                                 case NoteOn:
00375                                 case NoteOff:
00376                                 case ControlChange:
00377                                 case PitchBend:
00378                                 case AfterTouchPoly:
00379                                 case SongPosition:
00380                                         mPendingMessageExpectedLenght = 3;
00381                                         break;
00382                                         
00383                                 case SystemExclusive:
00384                                         mPendingMessageExpectedLenght = MIDI_SYSEX_ARRAY_SIZE; // As the message can be any lenght between 3 and MIDI_SYSEX_ARRAY_SIZE bytes
00385                                         break;
00386                                         
00387                                 case InvalidType:
00388                                 default:
00389                                         // This is obviously wrong. Let's get the hell out'a here.
00390                                         mPendingMessageIndex = 0;
00391                                         mPendingMessageExpectedLenght = 0;
00392                                         mRunningStatus_RX = InvalidType;
00393                                         return false;
00394                                         break;
00395                         }
00396                         
00397                         // Then update the index of the pending message.
00398                         mPendingMessageIndex++;
00399                         
00400                         // And call the parser, again.
00401                         return parse(inChannel);
00402                         
00403                 }
00404                 else { 
00405                         
00406                         
00407                         // First, test if this is a status byte
00408                         if (extracted >= 0x80) {
00409                                 
00410                                 // Reception of status bytes are allowed only for interleaved Real Time message or EOX
00411                                 switch (extracted) {
00412                                         case Clock:
00413                                         case Start:
00414                                         case Continue:
00415                                         case Stop:
00416                                         case ActiveSensing:
00417                                         case SystemReset:
00418 
00419                                                 /*
00420                                                  This is tricky. Here we will have to extract the one-byte message,
00421                                                  pass it to the structure for being read outside the MIDI class,
00422                                                  and recompose the message it was interleaved into.
00423                                                  
00424                                                  Oh, and without killing the running status.. 
00425                                                  
00426                                                  This is done by leaving the pending message as is, it will be completed on next calls.
00427                                                  */
00428                                                 
00429                                                 mMessage.type = (kMIDIType)extracted;
00430                                                 mMessage.data1 = 0;
00431                                                 mMessage.data2 = 0;
00432                                                 mMessage.channel = 0;
00433                                                 mMessage.valid = true;
00434                                                 return true;
00435                                                 
00436                                                 break;
00437                                         
00438                                                 // End of Exclusive
00439                                         case 0xF7:
00440                                                 if (getTypeFromStatusByte(mPendingMessage[0]) == SystemExclusive) {
00441                                                         
00442                                                         // Store System Exclusive array in midimsg structure
00443                                                         for (byte i=0;i<MIDI_SYSEX_ARRAY_SIZE;i++) {
00444                                                                 mMessage.sysex_array[i] = mPendingMessage[i];
00445                                                         }
00446                                                         
00447                                                         // Get length
00448                                                         mMessage.data1 = mPendingMessageIndex+1;
00449                                                         mMessage.data2 = 0;
00450                                                         mMessage.channel = 0;
00451                                                         mMessage.valid = true;
00452                                                         
00453                                                         mPendingMessageIndex = 0;
00454                                                         mPendingMessageExpectedLenght = 0;
00455                                                         mRunningStatus_RX = InvalidType;
00456                                                         
00457                                                         return true;
00458                                                 }
00459                                                 else {
00460                                                         // Well well well.. error.
00461                                                         mPendingMessageIndex = 0;
00462                                                         mPendingMessageExpectedLenght = 0;
00463                                                         mRunningStatus_RX = InvalidType;
00464                                                         return false;
00465                                                 }
00466 
00467                                                 break;
00468                                         default:
00469                                                 break;
00470                                 }
00471                                 
00472                                 
00473                                 
00474                         }
00475                         
00476                         
00477                         // Add extracted data byte to pending message
00478                         mPendingMessage[mPendingMessageIndex] = extracted;
00479                         
00480                         
00481                         // Now we are going to check if we have reached the end of the message
00482                         if (mPendingMessageIndex >= (mPendingMessageExpectedLenght-1)) {
00483                                 
00484                                 // "FML" case: fall down here with an overflown SysEx..
00485                                 // This means we received the last possible data byte that can fit the buffer.
00486                                 // If this happens, try increasing MIDI_SYSEX_ARRAY_SIZE.
00487                                 if (getTypeFromStatusByte(mPendingMessage[0]) == SystemExclusive) {
00488                                         mPendingMessageIndex = 0;
00489                                         mPendingMessageExpectedLenght = 0;
00490                                         mRunningStatus_RX = InvalidType;
00491                                         return false;
00492                                 }
00493                                 
00494                                 
00495 
00496                                 
00497                                 mMessage.type = getTypeFromStatusByte(mPendingMessage[0]);
00498                                 mMessage.channel = (mPendingMessage[0] & 0x0F)+1; // Don't check if it is a Channel Message
00499                                 
00500                                 
00501                                 /*Serial << "Debug:";
00502                                 for (unsigned i=0;i<8;i++) {
00503                                         Serial << " 0x";
00504                                         Serial.printNumber(mPendingMessage[i],16);
00505                                 }
00506                                 Serial << endl;
00507                                 Serial << "ExpLen: " << (int)mPendingMessageExpectedLenght;
00508                                 Serial << "\t Index: " << (int)mPendingMessageIndex << endl;*/
00509                                 
00510                                 mMessage.data1 = mPendingMessage[1]; // Checking this is futile, as 1 byte message were processed in the switch.
00511                                 mMessage.data2 = mPendingMessage[2];
00512                                 
00513                                 // Reset local variables
00514                                 mPendingMessageIndex = 0;
00515                                 mPendingMessageExpectedLenght = 0;
00516                                 
00517                                 mMessage.valid = true;
00518                                 
00519                                 // Activate running status (if enabled for the received type)
00520                                 switch (mMessage.type) {
00521                                         case NoteOff:
00522                                         case NoteOn:
00523                                         case AfterTouchPoly:
00524                                         case ControlChange:
00525                                         case ProgramChange:
00526                                         case AfterTouchChannel:
00527                                         case PitchBend: 
00528                                                 // Running status enabled: store it from received message
00529                                                 mRunningStatus_RX = mPendingMessage[0];
00530                                                 break;
00531                                                 
00532                                         default:
00533                                                 // No running status
00534                                                 mRunningStatus_RX = InvalidType;
00535                                                 break;
00536                                 }
00537                                 //Serial << "CME" << endl;;
00538                                 //Serial.printNumber(mMessage.type,16);
00539                                 return true;
00540                         }
00541                         else {
00542                                 // Then update the index of the pending message.
00543                                 mPendingMessageIndex++;
00544                                 
00545                                 // And call the parser, again.
00546                                 return parse(inChannel);
00547                         }
00548                         
00549                 }
00550                 
00551                 
00552         }
00553         
00554         // What are our chances to fall here?
00555         return false;
00556 }

00571 bool MIDI_Class::check() { return mMessage.valid; }

00592 void MIDI_Class::setThruFilterMode(kThruFilterMode inThruFilterMode) {

00594         if (mThruFilterMode != Off) mThruActivated = true;
00595         else mThruActivated = false;
00596 }
00602 void MIDI_Class::setThruFilterMode(byte inThruFilterMode) { 
00603         mThruFilterMode = (kThruFilterMode)inThruFilterMode;
00604         if (mThruFilterMode != Off) mThruActivated = true;
00605         else mThruActivated = false;
00606 }

00610 void MIDI_Class::turnThruOn(kThruFilterMode inThruFilterMode) { 
00611         mThruActivated = true;
00612         mThruFilterMode = inThruFilterMode;

00615 void MIDI_Class::turnThruOff() {
00616         mThruActivated = false; 
00617         mThruFilterMode = Off;

00619 
00620 /* This method is called upon reception of a message and checks if the message stored is destinated to be read (matching channel).
00621         It also takes care of Thru filtering and sending.
00622  */
00623 bool MIDI_Class::filter(byte inChannel) {
00624         
00625         /*
00626                 This method handles both recognition of channel (to know if the message is destinated to the Arduino) and Soft-Thru filtering.
00627          
00628                 Soft-Thru filtering:
00629                 - All system messages (System Exclusive, Common and Real Time) are passed to output unless filter is set to Off
00630                 - Channel messages are passed to the output whether their channel is matching the input channel and the filter setting
00631          
00632          */
00633         
00634         
00635         bool validate_message = false;
00636         
00637         // First, check if the received message is Channel
00638         if (mMessage.type >= NoteOff && mMessage.type <= PitchBend) {
00639                 
00640                 // Then we need to know if we listen to it
00641                 if ((mMessage.channel == mInputChannel) || (mInputChannel == MIDI_CHANNEL_OMNI)) {
00642                         validate_message = true;
00643                         
00644                 }
00645                 else {
00646                         // We don't listen to this channel
00647                         validate_message = false;
00648                 }
00649                 
00650                 // Now let's pass it to the output
00651                 switch (mThruFilterMode) {
00652                         case Full:
00653                                 send(mMessage.type,mMessage.data1,mMessage.data2,mMessage.channel);
00654                                 break;
00655                         case SameChannel:
00656                                 if (validate_message) {
00657                                         send(mMessage.type,mMessage.data1,mMessage.data2,mMessage.channel);
00658                                 }
00659                                 break;
00660                         case DifferentChannel:
00661                                 if (!validate_message) {
00662                                         send(mMessage.type,mMessage.data1,mMessage.data2,mMessage.channel);
00663                                 }
00664                         case Off:
00665                                 // Do nothing
00666                                 break;
00667                         default:
00668                                 break;
00669                 }
00670                 
00671         }
00672         else {
00673                 
00674                 // System messages are always received
00675                 validate_message = true;
00676                 
00677                 // Send the message to the output
00678                 if (mThruFilterMode != Off) {
00679                         switch (mMessage.type) {
00680                                         // Real Time and 1 byte
00681                                 case Clock:
00682                                 case Start:
00683                                 case Stop:
00684                                 case Continue:
00685                                 case ActiveSensing:
00686                                 case SystemReset:
00687                                 case TuneRequest:       
00688                                         sendRealTime(mMessage.type);
00689                                         break;
00690                                         
00691                                 case SystemExclusive:
00692                                         // Send SysEx (0xF0 and 0xF7 are included in the buffer)
00693                                         sendSysEx(mMessage.data1,mMessage.sysex_array,true); 
00694                                         break;
00695                                         
00696                                 case SongSelect:
00697                                         sendSongSelect(mMessage.data1); // TODO: check this
00698                                         break;
00699                                         
00700                                 case SongPosition:
00701                                         sendSongPosition(mMessage.data1 | ((unsigned)mMessage.data2<<7));       // TODO: check this
00702                                         break;
00703                                 
00704                                 case TimeCodeQuarterFrame:
00705                                         sendTimeCodeQuarterFrame(mMessage.data1,mMessage.data2); // TODO: check this
00706                                         break;
00707                                 default:
00708                                         break;
00709                         }
00710                         
00711                 }
00712                 
00713         }
00714 
00715         
00716         
00717         
00718         return validate_message;
00719 }
